text: AEW Fight Forever is a professional wrestling sport video game. It was published by THQ Nordic. It was developed by Yuke's. It was released worldwide for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Microsoft Windows, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on June 29, 2023. It is All Elite Wrestling (AEW)'s first video game and Yuke's first wrestling game since they released WWE 2K19 in 2018. ==Gameplay== On November 10, 2020, Kenny Omega said the game would have a similar feeling to playing AKI engine games like WWF No Mercy and Virtual Pro Wrestling. On September 20, 2021, it was announced that Owen Hart would be added to the game. This was announced as part of a partnership between AEW and the Owen Hart Foundation. This is Hart's first time in a video game since appearing in 2004's Showdown: Legends of Wrestling. On August 3, 2022, CM Punk was revealed to be on the cover along with Dr. Britt Baker, D.M.D., Kenny Omega, Chris Jericho, Jon Moxley, and Jade Cargill. After Punk got suspended from the company for a backstage incident, he was removed from the cover. Sting, MJF, Orange Cassidy, Bryan Danielson, and "Hangman" Adam Page. On August 24, 2023, a battle royale mode called Stadium Stampede was added to the game. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2023 video games Category:All Elite Wrestling Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Professional wrestling video games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games Category:Yuke's games
title: AEW Fight Forever
